body:
This represents the official release of Apicurio Studio, version 0.2.19.Final.

The following issues have been resolved in this release:

* [#524](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/524) openshift templates
* [#522](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/522) UX - Consistent message for inline rules
* [#520](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/520) API Details: Show # of collaborators
* [#519](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/519) Collaborate: Update the UI for collaboration/invitations based on UX designs
* [#517](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/517) Editor: Make error messages consistent when creating entities
* [#515](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/515) Editor: Remove "Data Type" and "Path" from right-click context menus in master panel
* [#512](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/512) Editor: Remove the "Add Contact Info" dialog 
* [#511](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/511) New API: Template boxes don't flow well on resize
* [#510](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/510) Editor: Remove separator line from Path/Data Type context menu kabob
* [#509](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/509) Define Security Requirement:  scope checkboxes can overlap when the scope names are long
* [#508](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/508) [Question] Is there a config item for local Bitbucket (like local Gitlab)?
* [#507](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/507) Only "owners" should be allowed to delete APIs
* [#505](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/505) Path Parameters Can't Parse Extensions
* [#504](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/504) Allow me to make other users on a project as owners
* [#502](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/502) [Snyk] Fix for 8 vulnerable dependencies
* [#501](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/501) [Snyk] Fix for 3 vulnerable dependencies
* [#499](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/499) Editor: Add "collapse all [except]..." actions for UI sections
* [#496](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/496) Editor: handle up/down arrows in Path and Data Type lists (master section)
* [#495](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/495) Editor: Convert all components to OnPush for UI performance reasons
* [#493](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/493) massive changes to how operations are displayed
* [#492](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/492) Dashboard:  Icon not active on left nav by default
* [#490](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/490) Deployment: Upgrade to latest Thorntail (replace WF Swarm)
* [#489](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/489) Editor:  Update L&F of operations
* [#488](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/488) Required property should not be flagged as invalid when using inside allOf
* [#487](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/487) Editor: Data types misses type: object
* [#472](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/472) Location of APICURIO_UI_URL when configuring keycloak for Apicurio?
* [#465](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/465) Editor: Validation aggregate overlay panel displays *under* the Ace editor content
* [#448](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/448) Collaborators: Improve the Copy To Clipboard feature
* [#292](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/292) API Editor: Implement "delete all" for all global entities
* [#284](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/284) Feature: Clone/Make Copy of API
* [#190](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/190) API Details: Action to convert from 2.0 to 3.0
* [#67](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/67) API Editor Page: use Pull Request when committing changes?


For more information, please see the Apicurio Studio's official project site:

* [General Information](http://www.apicur.io/)
* [Download/Quickstart](http://www.apicur.io/download)
* [Blog](http://www.apicur.io/blog)
name: Beta 2.19
